about_the_game:
Keziah’s Realm is an immersive survival game where you and 144 NPCs are scattered across a vast map divided into 36 procedurally generated chunks, each belonging to one of eight unique biomes. From the very start, you must forage for resources, craft essential items, and defend yourself to survive the perilous first night. From then on collaboration is key; forming clans with other survivors allows each member to specialize in roles such as hunting for food or constructing shelters. This specialization enables players to focus on their strengths while relying on their clanmates for other essential tasks, fostering a dynamic and cooperative gameplay experience.

As clans grow by recruiting more members, a leader will be elected based on their popularity and contributions. The leader plays a crucial role in making strategic decisions, such as managing relations with other clans and planning the expansion of settlements. The game’s world is a living, breathing ecosystem where every creature must survive and reproduce, adding layers of realism and complexity. This constant simulation requires players to continually adapt to the evolving environment, ensuring that no two experiences are ever the same.

Key Features Include:

  • Explore a rich procedurally generated world

  • Form relationships and memories with NPCs

  • Forage, hunt, fish, farm and cook food for yourself and others

  • Craft and upgrade items for survival or amusement

  • Build bases to keep your clan safe

  • Trade with NPCs from inside and outside your clan

  • Recruit new members to your clan

  • Establish new settlements or invade and capture existing settlements

  • Defend your clan from invaders

  • Have children to avoid permanent death

  • Lead your clan to glory

short_description: Forage, craft, fight, form clans, and expand your settlements in a dynamic, ever-changing ecosystem. Keziah’s Realm offers a unique gaming experience where you must survive in a rich, procedurally generated world, alongside intelligent NPCs who possess abilities equal to those of the player.
